title: Gloves
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Name                                                           | Gloves        |
| :------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------- |
| Size to wear                                                   | small, medium |
| [Armour Class](/Armour_class "Armour class")                   | 1             |
| [Encumbrance rating](/Encumbrance_rating "Encumbrance rating") | 0             |
| Maximum Enchantment                                            | +2            |
| Grants                                                         | nothing       |
| Time to Wear                                                   | 5             |

|   |                   |
| - | ----------------- |
|   | A pair of gloves. |

**Gloves** are the only form of [armour](/Armour "Armour") capable of being worn on a character's hand slot, providing +1 base [AC](/AC "AC") and capable of being [enchanted](/Scroll_of_enchant_armour "Scroll of enchant armour") for an additional +2 AC. They may generate with the following [egos](/Ego "Ego"):

- [Strength](/Strength "Strength") (+3)
- [Dexterity](/Dexterity "Dexterity") (+3)
- [Stealth](/Stealth "Stealth") (+50)
- [Hurling](/Hurling "Hurling")
- [Infusion](/Infusion_\(ego\) "Infusion (ego)")

## Restrictions

Gloves are incompatible with the [Claws](/Claws "Claws") [mutation](/Mutation "Mutation"); wearing gloves over a rank 1 or 2 mutation will negate the mutation, and a rank 3 mutation makes gloves unwearable.

[Oni](/Oni "Oni") and [trolls](/Troll "Troll") are too large for gloves, [spriggans](/Spriggan "Spriggan") are too small, and [octopodes](/Octopode "Octopode") and [felids](/Felid "Felid") don't have hands to wear them on.

## History

- In [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), the [Infusion (ego)](/Infusion_\(ego\) "Infusion (ego)") was introduced, and the [archery](/Archery "Archery") ego was replaced with [hurling](/Hurling "Hurling").
- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), gloves couldn't have [Stealth](/Stealth "Stealth") ego.
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), [gauntlets](/Gauntlets "Gauntlets") and [bracers of archery](/Bracers_of_archery "Bracers of archery") also existed for the hand slot. Also, gloves needed to be removed before changing rings, meaning [cursed](/Curse "Curse") gloves made it impossible to change your [rings](/Ring "Ring").

html:
Gloves

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Name Gloves
Size to wear small, medium
Armour Class 1
Encumbrance rating 0
Maximum Enchantment +2
Grants nothing
Time to Wear 5


A pair of gloves.

Gloves are the only form of armour capable of being worn on a character's hand slot, providing +1 base AC and capable of being enchanted for an additional +2 AC. They may generate with the following egos:

  • Strength (+3)
  • Dexterity (+3)
  • Stealth (+50)
  • Hurling
  • Infusion

Restrictions

Gloves are incompatible with the Claws mutation; wearing gloves over a rank 1 or 2 mutation will negate the mutation, and a rank 3 mutation makes gloves unwearable.

Oni and trolls are too large for gloves, spriggans are too small, and octopodes and felids don't have hands to wear them on.

History

  • In 0.28, the Infusion (ego) was introduced, and the archery ego was replaced with hurling.
  • Prior to 0.27, gloves couldn't have Stealth ego.
  • Prior to 0.14, gauntlets and bracers of archery also existed for the hand slot. Also, gloves needed to be removed before changing rings, meaning cursed gloves made it impossible to change your rings.

{{flavour|A pair of gloves.}}

'''Gloves''' are the only form of [[armour]] capable of being worn on a character's hand slot, providing +1 base [[AC]] and capable of being [[scroll of enchant armour|enchanted]] for an additional +2 AC. They may generate with the following [[ego]]s:
*[[Strength]] (+3)
*[[Dexterity]] (+3)
*[[Stealth]] (+50)
*[[Hurling]]
*[[Infusion (ego)|Infusion]]

==Restrictions==
Gloves are incompatible with the [[Claws]] [[mutation]]; wearing gloves over a rank 1 or 2 mutation will negate the mutation, and a rank 3 mutation makes gloves unwearable.

[[Oni]] and [[troll]]s are too large for gloves, [[spriggan]]s are too small, and [[octopode]]s and [[felid]]s don't have hands to wear them on.

==History==
*In [[0.28]], the [[Infusion (ego)]] was introduced, and the [[archery]] ego was replaced with [[hurling]].
*Prior to [[0.27]], gloves couldn't have [[Stealth]] ego.
*Prior to [[0.14]], [[gauntlets]] and [[bracers of archery]] also existed for the hand slot. Also, gloves needed to be removed before changing rings, meaning [[curse]]d gloves made it impossible to change your [[ring]]s.
